knimeNode.name: Inductive Miner (DFG)
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node mines a process tree from directly-follows model (DFG Table) with the Inductive Miner.

fullDescription.intro: Inductive Miner (DFG Table) discovers a process model in the form of a process tree.
fullDescription.option: Noise threshold is used to set the fitting trace percent with respect to the new model. 0.8 is as the default value.
